title: sharaNu sharaNu
sahitya:
sharaNu sharaNu


anupallavi

  sharaNU sakalOddhAra asurakula samhAra arasu dasharatha bAla jAnakI lOla


caraNam 1    I muddu I mukhavu I tanuvina kAnti I billu I bANa I nIti bhAva 
I tamma I sIte I baNDa I bhAgya Avari dEvariguNTu bhUlOkadoLage
    caraNam 2    uTTa pItAmbaravu uDi gejje mANikavu toTTa navaratna sara karuNaviralu 
koTTa nambike tappa tanna bhakutarigella shrSTiyoLeNe kANe kausalya rAma
    caraNam 3    bhAvisalu ayOdhyA paTTaNadali vAsa bEDidiSTArttagaLa koDuvenenutiralu 
bhAva shuddigaLella tanna bhakutara poreva purandara viTTalane raghurAma nissIma rAma
